price: 28. Mpe bazali koloba: Elonga ekozala tango nini soki bozali na bosölo?
arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡفَتۡحُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wayaqūlūna matā hādhā al-fatḥu in kuntum ṣādiqīna
